java.lang.Object

public class ColumnTag
extends BodyTagSupport

Implements one column of a displayed data list

setSortattr

public void setSortattr(java.lang.String sortAttr)
Sets the attribute to sort on. This will override the attribute, if any, bound to the column

Parameters:
sortAttr - sort attribute

setHeaderkey

public void setHeaderkey(java.lang.String key)
Sets the resource bundle key used to display the column's header

Parameters:
key - resource bundle key

setHeadertext

public void setHeadertext(java.lang.String text)
Sets the text to display in the column's header. "header text" may be used instead of a header key in cases where there is no resource bundle needed. For example, if column heading was a system name and didn't need translation.

Parameters:
text - text
